name: BULLETGROUNDS
description:
Bulletgrounds is World War 2 themed multiplayer arcade shooter that features vehicles, large maps, destruction and build elements.Featuring
  • Totally realistically unrealistic weapons from WW2!
  • Even more unrealistic vehicles! Use tanks! Fly with planes! Fly with tanks! Or don't. You're a big boy, you do what you want.
  • Huge outdoor levels. Feel free to ignore objects and just drive to the sunset. Your team probably wont miss you anyway.
  • Destruction. Oh boy, smack those buildings, bunkers and walls down!
  • Buildmode: Oh boy, erect those buildings, bunkers and walls!
  • Not very unique gamemodes that every game other game has done before.
